creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com
text:
A basic functionality missing on the filters is a way to match a regular
expression and replace on output based on matching content.
This is a thing we can do with file names mappers but not with filter readers.

<replaceRegExp>
  <regexp pattern="\(.*\)-start" />
  <replace value="&1"/>
</replaceRegExp>

creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
I have made a patch (18312) that should fullfill this request.
The following: (using patch (18166 - enchanched concat)
    <concat>
      (hello)-start line
      <filterchain>
        <tokenfilter>
          <containsregex pattern="\((.*)\)-start" replace="&\1"/>
        </tokenfilter>
      </filterchain>
    </concat>

outputs:
      &hello line

Peter.
